# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $10000 to you. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $9500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that could significantly enhance your experience. Should you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to reach out. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
